title: My kids are unvaccinated. What mixture of essential oils can I use to prevent them from catching measles?
description: Answer (1 of 108): You claim to have a PhD in Biochemistry yet you ask this question?? Do you love your kids? Even if you do not them, at least be humane and get them immunized anyway against not just measles but everything that can be done. Measles is too bloody dangerous to stuff bout with a...
